title: Vintage Industrial Pendant Light
body: Created as a reaction to heavier, clunkier Italian designs of the time, the Contemporary Pendant Lamp also known as The Three-Arm Ceiling lamp by Serge Mouille was designed in 1958 and one of the most desired fixtures by Serge Mouille due to the versatile possibilities and it's striking beautiful design. Its wide radius allows it to illuminate even the largest living or dining room, while the adjustable shades mean that the light can be brightened or softened depending on the mood.
